paper_abstract: The convergence of the solution of the discretized a"e-linear Beltrami equation arising in a recent reconstruction algorithm for electrical impedance tomography based on the uniqueness proof of Astala-Paivarinta is investigated. A new discretization is introduced for the L (p) -convergence analysis and an O(h (delta) ) convergence result is proved given C (delta) -continuous coefficient functions. Numerical comparisons are made between three different methods. These suggest that the polar coordinate discretization method of Daripa applied in the present context is preferable.
paper_title: Convergence of a numerical solver for an a"e-linear Beltrami equation
